title.content-text: 7.1.5 - Last Mile and Long Range WAN Technologies

brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts several Enterprise networks using a variety of devices and connections that are linked to the ISP, as follows:

Dialup using the telephone line to connect to the ISP.
DSL using the telephone line to connect to the ISP.
Cable modem using coaxial cable to connect to the ISP.
Wireless bridge using a wireless signal to connect to the ISP.
T1 Leased Line to connect to the ISP.
Satellite modem connecting to a satellite that connects to the ISP.
